thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Rodney DeGabriele

author: Rodney DeGabriele
title: Rodney DeGabriele
text: After reviewing all other virtual/serviced office operators in Melbourne, Servcorp was definitely a stand out! The leadership team and attentive staff have always been extremely helpful, supportive and provided me with flexibility where required. The working environment for small / large businesses is great! The services provided are A1 and I have no hesitation is recommending Servcorp what so ever.
